alert.note: Alert for Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 25 at 12:33AM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile at times in dense fog. * WHERE...In Georgia, Echols County. In Florida, Hamilton, Suwannee, Gilchrist, Northern Columbia and Southern Columbia Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may rapidly change on high speed roadways, remain alert for sudden visibility changes.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
